revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #12 Anana (Nanab) |image = [[File:Nanab.png]] |caption = Esta es la séptima baya descubierta en todo el mundo. Aunque amarga, tiene un cierto toque dulce. |growtime = 4m 10s |harvest = 11 bayas |replant = 40% |mutation = 1.7% |points = 25 |flavor =
*0 picante *0 seco *10 dulce *10 amargo *0 ácido }} '''Latano (Nanab)''' es un tipo de [[Berries|baya]] que puede ser plantada en la [[Farm|granja]]. Se puede obtener rodeando una parcela vacía con al menos 1 baya [[Pecha|Meloc (Pecha)]] y al menos 1 baya [[Aspear|Perasi (Aspear)]]. == Tablas de Crecimiento == === Estados de Crecimiento === {| class="wikitable"| style = "image-rendering: pixelated" ! !! Brote !! Crecimiento !! Floración !! Madurez |- ! Tiempo pasado desde que se planta | 25 seg || 30 seg || 35 seg || 4 mins 10 seg - 8 mins 20 seg |- ! Animación |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:NanabTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:NanabTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:NanabTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Tiempos de Maduración con modificadores === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" ! Modificador !! Tiempo hasta la madurez-marchitado |- ! Ninguno | 4 min 10 seg -
8 min 20 seg |- ! Psydugadera | 2 min 47 seg -
5 min 53 seg |} == Diagrama de Flujo == [[File:Nanab_Flow_Chart.png|200px]]
'''Leyenda:'''
· Random Drop: Obtenido aleatoriamente en ruta == Estrategia de mutación == === Posibles formaciones === Puedes llenar tu granja del siguiente modo para obtener bayas Latano (Nanab). Los cuadrados morados indican dónde pueden ocurrir las mutaciones.
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Base Formation |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Pecha.png|30px]] [[Pecha]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Aspear.png|30px]] [[Aspear]] |}
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Optimized Planting Formation |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Pecha.png|30px]] [[Pecha]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Pecha.png|30px]] [[Pecha]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Aspear.png|30px]] [[Aspear]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Aspear.png|30px]] [[Aspear]] |- style="height: 50px;" | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | [[File:Pecha.png|30px]] [[Pecha]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Pecha.png|30px]] [[Pecha]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Aspear.png|30px]] [[Aspear]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Aspear.png|30px]] [[Aspear]] |}
=== Timing Table === {| class="wikitable"| style="text-align: center;" |+ ''All planting times use the time-to-ripe remaining of the first planted berry for subsequent planting times'' ! Berry !! Planting Time with
No Modifier !! Planting Time with
Mulch or Sprayduck || Planting Time with
Mulch & Sprayduck |- | [[Aspear]] || - || - || - |- | [[Pecha]] || 1 min until ripe || 40 secs until ripe || Not Practical |- |}
==Uses== ===Mutations===
Nanab berries can be used to mutate the following berries.
{| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" |- ! Used In !! With |- | [[File:Magost.png|20px]] [[Magost]] || [[File:Pecha.png|20px]] [[Pecha]]
[[File:Mago.png|20px]] [[Mago]] |- | [[File:Roseli.png|20px]] [[Roseli]] || [[File:Mago.png|20px]] [[Mago]]
[[File:Magost.png|20px]] [[Magost]]
[[File:Watmel.png|20px]] [[Watmel]] |- |}
===[[Safari Zone]] bait===
As a type of bait, Nanab berries give Pokémon in the Safari Zone "eating" status for 2 - 6 turns, and boosts catch chance by 1.5x for the rest of the encounter unless another type of bait is used.
==Acquisition== ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/head‎|Berries}} {{LootItem|Berry Forest|Epic}} {{LootItem|Radio Tower|Epic}} {{LootItem|Fullmoon Island|Common}} {{LootItem|Newmoon Island|Common}} {{LootItem|Floccesy Ranch|Epic}} |} |}

{{Berries}}

Mulch or Sprayduck || Planting Time with
Mulch & Sprayduck |- | [[Aspear]] || - || - || - |- | [[Pecha]] || 1 min until ripe || 40 secs until ripe || Not Practical |- |}
